description: Set the distractions aside in write in a relaxing place of your creation! I've wanted something like this for years but I've never found anything with this level of functionality! Great work.
This is perfect for a 'focused' writing session. I also love the typewriter effects.

The normal font size is too small, as far as I can see the only way to increase the size of the font is to use the 'Headings' setting which is far from ideal, particularly as I transport and edit documents from different apps.
summary: No way to change font size

description: For those of you frustrated with being unable to change fonts - you can. Go to themes, click "duplicate theme" and then "edit theme" - ez peazy.
summary: Dead simple. Gets you to write

description:
You may have to use this in a second desktop if you try to
Configure the printer!
summary: Hope you all know how to use xkill  ?

description: App which lets you focus on your toughts.
summary: Just what is intended to be

description: Superb zum schreiben. Ich liebe die Schreibmaschinensounds... inspiriert mich irgendwie.

Très jolie interface, mais je n'ai pas trouvé comment changer la taille des caractères trop petits pour mes yeux, ni comment choisir la police. 
C'est dommage car le document peut-être exporté dans un nombre suffisant de formats.
summary: Manque de choix police et taille des caractères
